pageContext.claim: “My administration has fully or partially cleaned up 61 EPA Superfund pollution sites that were rotting all over our country -- far more than Obama and Biden -- no matter how far you go back, more than any administration.”
pageContext.analysis: The president is overstating his success. An investigation by InsideClimate News, the Texas Observer and NBC News found that work on nearly every Superfund site the administration claimed to have cleaned up began decades earlier. Moreover, the investigation found, the backlog of sites has grown to the highest number in 15 years at the same time as the administration has cut and continues to propose cuts for the Superfund program’s budget.
